      Default constructor for a reservation
      Reservation(java.time.LocalDate reservationStartDate, java.time.LocalDate reservationEndDate, java.lang.Integer staffId, java.lang.Integer administratorId)
      A reservation constructor that allows the user to pass the start date, end date, member of staff requesting the reservation and the administrator who made it.

        A reservation constructor that allows the user to pass the start date, end date, member of staff requesting the reservation and the administrator who made it.
        Parameters:
        reservationStartDate - The start date of the reservation
        reservationEndDate - The end date of the reservation
        staffId - The member of staff requesting the reservation
        administratorId - The administrator making the reservation

      • doDatesClash

        public java.lang.Boolean doDatesClash(java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                      java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Compares the start dates and end dates of a reservation with another value by iterating through the dates to check if there is a clash with another object's dates
        Parameters:
        startDate - Start date of the new object
        endDate - End date of the new object
        Returns:
        True if a clash was found, false if a reservation can be made
